Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
June 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

It's time to break out the confetti, unleash the balloons, and raise a toast! We are thrilled to announce that we have reached another significant milestone as The Justia Insider turns three. Our third anniversary is a time for celebration and an opportunity to reflect on our achievements. Please take a moment to appreciate the milestones we've reached, the projects we've delivered, and the goals we've surpassed. Our accomplishments are a testament to our collective efforts and the unbreakable spirit that defines Justia.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Justia SEC Contracts. We kept our focus on improving this property. We rolled out multiple updates this month, including more straightforward navigation through the site by introducing contract filtering based on business categories and industries.

Justia Referral Program. We introduced a reward program for all our clients when they refer our services to other lawyers. We launched this referral program through a marketing campaign with a unique code for sharing.

Justia Elevate. Like every month, we introduced more features and improvements to our Justia Elevate platform. This month, we enhanced the capabilities of the standard Yoast SEO plugin to support more powerful redirect functionality, bringing more value to our customers.

Justia Portal. Updates to strengthen our content and SEO are continuously occurring for our main portal. This month, we updated the latest version of California Criminal Jury Instructions (CALCRIM) and California Civil Jury Instructions (CACI). We also conducted a mass update to the title tags of our consumer content pages.

Justia Mexico Portal. This month, a significant backend migration allowed us to push content updates more regularly. This opened up the possibility for editorial updates without the development team's involvement.

Justia Connect. Besides the regular webinars and improvements to Justia Connect, this month marks the anniversary of Justia Connect Pro, so we prepared a special campaign to thank the Pro members who reached that mark with us.

Jurispro. One of our Justia friends, the Jurispro portal, allows attorneys to connect with professionals to serve as expert witnesses. This month, we released the tools for site editors to publish FAQs to provide better context to users and improve the site's SEO.

Data. Our Data Team keeps on obtaining more insights from our properties' usage and statistics. This month, they added new metrics to the summaries newsletters' automated dashboards. They also presented an analysis of SEC contracts and clauses.

Justia Ask A Lawyer. Our Editorial Team is actively monitoring the best answers from our lawyers. This month, we are changing the Justia Ask A Lawyer listing pages to feature quality content more prominently.

IT Maintenances. AWS (our cloud provider) usually issues maintenance requests for our running servers. Our IT Team is on top of all of them. This month, they handled maintenance tasks for projects such as Justia Elevate, JLD, Justia Dockets, Justia Regulations, and other internal resources.

Justia Regulations. As usual, we published the first quarterly update of all state regulations for 2023 live.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Supreme Court Justices Bios. We completed biographies of all U.S. Supreme Court Justices, including notable opinions they wrote, for the Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center.
  • Justia Legal Dictionary. We developed a detailed prompt and reviewed AI-generated definitions of legal terms in preparation for creating a Justia Legal Dictionary with the assistance of AI.
  • 50-State Surveys Expanded. We worked on surveys on minimum wage laws, marriage license laws, and dog bite laws by state, which will be added to our Employment Law, Family Law, and Personal Injury centers, respectively.
  • Commercial Real Estate Content. We wrote several new pages for the Small Business Center on legal concerns for businesses buying, selling, or leasing property.

JUSTIA PET NEWS

Lovely Nymeria and Clever Maya

Nymeria turned four, and Maya is three and a half years old. Both love to go for a walk and chase the ball. They're always ready to perform some tricks as long as they have treats. They also enjoy sleeping all day and receiving tons of love from their devoted and caring owners.

- Zoraida Vallejo &
Roberto Escareño

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia’s Got Talent 2

We have successfully wrapped up the second episode of our remarkable in-house talent competition! The Justia community took great pleasure in showcasing their exceptional abilities and enthusiastically supporting their colleagues. From dazzling singers hitting mesmerizing high notes to graceful dancers effortlessly gliding across the floor, the talent on display was nothing short of awe-inspiring. The talent show once again proved to be an unforgettable event of entertainment. Thanks to everyone who participated and cheered on!

DID YOU KNOW?

Students Visited the MX Office

Students and teachers from the Technical Institute of Agujita, Coahuila, visited the MX Office. We were delighted to receive students in our offices again; this is the biggest group we have ever received! We chatted about Justia, our internship program, and much more. The Justia talent initiatives are important for the development and benefit of young talent in the region.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

The Ten Thousand Doors of January

"This book follows January Scaller in the early 1900s. She and her motley crew consisting of her dog, a former slave, and a neighbor boy, work together to find out who she really is and how to save her world from the loss of magical doors. The story pulls you in and makes you believe that magic truly exists as you find yourself trying to solve the mystery along with January. It will leave you wanting more of the world Harrow created."

- Sarah Dondysh

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Genaro Osoria, Haydee Garcia, Jorge Contreras, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Omar Carreon, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
